doc.repnme: Transcript of meeting of the Executive Directors of the IBRD and IDA, held on Tuesday, November 30, 1971 : Zaire - Education Project
doc.abstracts: This partial transcript, from the session of the Executive Directors of the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) and International Development Association (IDA) held on Tuesday, November 30, 1971 covers only the discussion on the Education Project for Zaire.
doc.docna: Transcript of meeting of the Executive Directors of the IBRD and IDA, held on Tuesday, November 30, 1971 : Zaire - Education Project
